data.name: Transient - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Original Soundtrack of TRANSIENT in lossless WAV format, featuring 27 tracks totalling one hour and thirty-eight minutes (00:01:38) of eerie, atmospheric music.
data.about_the_game: Original Soundtrack of TRANSIENT in lossless WAV format, featuring 27 tracks totalling one hour and thirty-eight minutes (00:01:38) of eerie, atmospheric music.
data.short_description: Original Soundtrack of TRANSIENT in lossless WAV format
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
